input_text:
Job Title: SVP Revenue Operations & Strategy

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Information Technology, Sales

Description:
See yourself at Dataminr

At Dataminr, we are creating a team of talented builders, creators and visionaries to have a real-world impact on how organizations respond to fast-emerging events as they unfold. We are over 600 talented individuals, spanning seven global offices, united by our passion to use AI for the greater good and be agents of positive change in our company and in our communities.

We offer a competitive benefits package aimed at keeping you healthy and happy:

Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance plan options for employees, domestic partners and their dependentsGenerous PTO, flexible sick days and remote working optionsPaid parental leave and family forming benefitsMental health benefits and supportCompany equity (RSUs)



At Dataminr, we serve a global community made up of many cultures and strive to reflect the diversity of the world in which we live. We stand for social justice and we lead with empathy. We foster a culture of allyship, standing up for those who face systemic barriers to equality. We actively condemn racism and discrimination in any form.

We believe our differences give us strength. Our employees are empowered to be their best, authentic selves through various opportunities, such as our robust employee resource group (ERG) network, learning and development funds, and more.

See yourself at Dataminr

As a seasoned Revenue Operations leader, you’ve built and continuously improved high-performing global sales organizations. Your deep understanding of sales processes, intuition, and empathy for revenue-generating teams have resulted in proven tangible success.

With extensive experience in a hyper-growth B2B SaaS environment, you’re comfortable navigating ambiguity and driving sales transformation. You have successfully developed, scaled, and executed strategies that improve and enable sales productivity, delivering growth results against ambitious business targets.

Reporting to the President & COO, you'll be part of a growing sales organization that supports thousands of customers across our Private Sector and Public Sector business in multiple geographies and industries across the globe. You're excited to be part of Dataminr's mission to leverage AI as a force for good.

This US-based role can be remote or based out of our New York City office.

At Dataminr, we are creating a team of talented builders, creators and visionaries to have a real-world impact on how organizations respond to fast-emerging events as they unfold. We are over 600 talented individuals, spanning seven global offices, united by our passion to use AI for the greater good and be agents of positive change in our company and in our communities.

We offer a competitive benefits package aimed at keeping you healthy and happy:

Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance plan options for employees, domestic partners and their dependentsGenerous PTO, flexible sick days and remote working optionsPaid parental leave and family forming benefitsMental health benefits and supportCompany equity (RSUs) 



At Dataminr, we serve a global community made up of many cultures and strive to reflect the diversity of the world in which we live. We stand for social justice and we lead with empathy. We foster a culture of allyship, standing up for those who face systemic barriers to equality. We actively condemn racism and discrimination in any form.

We believe our differences give us strength. Our employees are empowered to be their best, authentic selves through various opportunities, such as our robust employee resource group (ERG) network, learning and development funds, and more.

The opportunity 

Lead and scale a globally distributed Revenue Operations & Strategy department comprised of 30+ team members and growing across Sales Operations, Customer Success Operations, Sales Compensation, Deal Desk, Sales Technology, Sales Performance, and GTM Enablement Serve as thought leader and key stakeholder in defining and implementing sales strategy and processes, as well as sales team structure, coverage models, and sales roles Drive visibility and alignment across Sales Leadership through the use of KPIs, segmentation and analysis including owning the technology stack Partner with GTM Leadership on developing short- and long-term revenue strategies, including organizational design, operating priorities, forecasting, market analysis, performance improvement programs, etc. including customer recoup, retention and cross-sell/up-sell opportunitiesDrive operational excellence for GTM teams across New Business Sales, Account Management, Partnerships, Customer Success, Solutions Engineering, and MarketingPartner with Sales, Finance, and Go-to-Market teams to plan, forecast, and analyze sales growth, performance and territory planning Refine enablement strategy and execution through onboarding, territory and account planning, product and solution messaging, sales and success motions and plays, technical enablement, and leadership development Own sales compensation plan design and management in partnership with the People team to ensure that our incentive programs drive sales performance 



What You Bring 

At Dataminr, we value you for who you are. We encourage you to apply for this role, even if you don’t meet every qualification. Our candidates are reviewed on the basis of their skill and potential to succeed.

At least 15-20 years of experience in Revenue, Sales, and/or GTM Operations, preferably within fast-paced SaaS or high-growth technology environments with 7+ of pure Revops Leadership Experience in successfully implementing and scaling territory and segmentation frameworks and operationalizing complex sales cyclesExperience in successfully driving sales transformation, new organizational models, and change management in a complex, changing organization Proficiency in building and executing enablement programs and curriculums for global GTM teamsAdvanced knowledge of Excel and SFDC, Gainsight and/or SalesLoft is a plus Knowledge of sales methodologies such as Miller-Heiman, Winning by Design, SPIN, etc.Ability to work with a diverse team and influence/drive change across functional and business boundariesA consensus builder with strong interpersonal and communication skills, self-motivated and able to handle multiple competing priorities 



About Dataminr

Dataminr, the world’s leading real-time information discovery platform, delivers the earliest warnings on high-impact events, emerging risks and other critical business information far in advance of other sources. Recognized as one of the world’s leading AI businesses, Dataminr enables faster response, more effective risk mitigation and stronger crisis management for public and private sector organizations spanning global corporations, first responders, NGOs and newsrooms. Most recently valued at $4.1B, Dataminr serves more than two-thirds of the Fortune 50 and half of the Fortune 100 companies and over 650 newsrooms worldwide.

About Dataminr

Dataminr, the world’s leading real-time information discovery platform, delivers the earliest warnings on high-impact events, emerging risks and other critical business information far in advance of other sources. Recognized as one of the world’s leading AI businesses, Dataminr enables faster response, more effective risk mitigation and stronger crisis management for public and private sector organizations spanning global corporations, first responders, NGOs and newsrooms. Most recently valued at $4.1B, Dataminr serves more than two-thirds of the Fortune 50 and half of the Fortune 100 companies and over 650 newsrooms worldwide.

Colorado, New York, California, Washington only: The salary range for this position is as indicated below. Base salary ranges may vary by geographic location, applicant skills, and prior relevant experience, among other factors. Colorado: $x-y New York/California/Washington: $x-y

Dataminr is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. Individuals seeking employment at Dataminr are considered without regards to race, sex, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability, genetics, marital status, pregnancy, unemployment status, sexual orientation, citizenship status or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Executive
